rangeAfterTestStunGainSurgeDmgBlast.name: Arc Blasters
text: After a figure resolves a {RANGED} attack, each figure that suffered 1 or more {DMG} tests {STR}. Each figure that fails is Stunned.{BREAK}
{BREAK}
Each figure in this group gains:{BREAK}
{SURGE}: +1 {DMG}, Blast 1 {DMG}{BREAK}
Apply this surge effect before all others.

getPlus2AccuracyPlus1Dmg.name: Combat Veteran
text: While attacking, apply +2 Accuracy and +1 {DMG} to the results.

getPlus2Dmg.name: Critical Hit
text: While attacking, apply +2 {DMG} to the results.

deadeye.name: Deadeye
text: While attacking, apply +2 Accuracy to the results.

gainSurgeAfterSufferOneDmg.name: Experimental Arms
text: Each figure gains +1 {SURGE} while attacking.{BREAK}
After the attack is resolved, the attacking figure suffers +1 {DMG}.

targetMinus1Block.name: Exploit Weakness
text: All targets attacked by figures in this group apply -1 {BLOCK} to their defense results.

plusOneMovement.name: Fleet Footed
text: All figures gain 1 extra movement point.

attackStrainInsteadDmg.name: Heavy Pressure
text: Attacks deal {STRAIN} instead of {DMG}.

gainSurgeStunSurgeDmg.name: Imperial Industry
text: Each figure in this group gains:{BREAK}
{SURGE}: Stun{BREAK}
{SURGE}: +1 {DMG}{BREAK}
Apply these surge effects before all others.

imperialIndustryElite.name: Imperial Industry
text: Each figure in this group gains:{BREAK}
{SURGE}: Stun{BREAK}
{SURGE}: +2 {DMG}{BREAK}
{SURGE}: Recover 2 {DMG}{BREAK}
Apply these surge effects before all others.

jetpacks.name: Jetpacks
text: All figures gain Mobile.

figureNotBlockLOS.name: Marksman
text: Figures do not block line of sight for attacks.

extraSurgeIfTargetTwoStrain.name: No Quarter
text: If attacking a hero who has suffered 2 or more {STRAIN}, apply +1 {SURGE} to the results.

recovery.name: Recovery
text: All figures recover 2 {DMG}.

riotGrenades.name: Riot Grenades
text: All rebel heroes within 3 spaces of a figure in this group tests {INSIGHT}.{BREAK}
Each figure who fails suffers 1 {STRAIN}.{BREAK}
Limit 1 test per hero.

gainPierceSurgeBleed.name: Savage Weaponry
text: Each figure gains:{BREAK}
Pierce 1{BREAK}
{SURGE}: Bleed{BREAK}
Apply surge effect before all others.

withinTwoSpaceGainSurge.name: Shock Troopers
text: While attacking a figure within 2 spaces, apply +1 {SURGE} to the results.

focusOnAttack.name: Show of Force
text: While declaring an attack, become focused.

targetSuffersStrainDmg.name: Surgical Strike
text: After attacking a target, the target suffers an additional 1 {STRAIN} and 1 {DMG}.

extraAttackThenStunned.name: Sustained Fire
text: After resolving an attack, perform an additional attack. Then, become stunned and suffer 2 {DMG}.
